hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"When you come to a shepherd, call him three times. If he answers (all well and good), otherwise drink (milk from the flock) without taking advantage. And when you come to a garden call the owner of the garden three times. If he answers (all well and good), otherwise eat (from the produce of the garden) without taking advantage

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ مَرَّ عَلَى مَاشِيَةِ قَوْمٍ أَوْ حَائِطٍ هَلْ يُصِيبُ مِنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Passes By The Livestock (Of Some People) Or A Garden - Can He Take Something Fro
